text: (August 31, 1912 - August 5, 2023) was a Japanese actor. He is best known for playing monsters in several Toho science fiction and horror movies directed by Ishir≈ç Honda. He played Godzilla, alongside Haruo Nakajima, in the 1954 movie Godzilla. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1912 births Category:Japanese movie actors Category:Japanese centenarians
title: Katsumi Tezuka
